provisions.description: Constitution of the Republic of Singapore, Article 9 -- liberty of the person; fundamental liberty provision protecting against deprivation of life or personal liberty
provisions.expected_snippet: No person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty

provisions.description: Personal Data Protection Act 2012, Section 2 -- interpretation/definitions including personal data, organisation, data intermediary
Cybersecurity Act 2018, Section 2 -- interpretation and definitions for cybersecurity, critical information infrastructure, and cybersecurity threats
Companies Act 1967, Section 2 -- interpretation and definitions for company types, directors, officers, and corporate governance
Electronic Transactions Act 2010, Section 2 -- interpretation and definitions for electronic records, electronic signatures, and electronic communications
Computer Misuse Act 1993, Section 2 -- interpretation and definitions for computer, data, program, and unauthorised access
